case.title: friendship with benefits - 30
case.text:
!!! I am IT professional looking for cute female age 18+ for FWB. It means friendship with benefits. If you are student or working very hard job to make just enoguh moeny, I can help. No string attached, secretive, I will pay you generiously not to work hard and for a easy life. In return, I will want 1-2 hr weekly fun time with you. I will host you in queens/brooklyn or Long siland area. Be smart, creative and brave.
I just dont have time for lengthy dating.
